mapper.select: select count(*) from membertest where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update membertest set passwd=#{passwd}, tel=#{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email=#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select num,writer,email,subject,passwd, reg_date,content,ip,readcount,r from (select num,writer,email,subject,passwd,reg_date,content,ip,readcount,rownum r from (select num,writer,email,subject,passwd,reg_date ,content,ip,readcount from board order by num desc) ) where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
mapper.update: update board set readcount = readcount + 1 where num =#{num}
mapper.insert: insert into board ( num, writer, email, subject, passwd, reg_date, content, ip) values(board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subject}, #{passwd}, #{reg_date}, #{content}, #{ip})
mapper.update: update board set email=#{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, passwd=#{passwd} where num=#{num}
